price: ንጉሡም «እርሱን አምጡልኝ ለራሴ ግለኛ አደርገዋለሁና» አለ፡፡ ባናገረውም ጊዜ «አንተ ዛሬ እኛ ዘንድ ባለሟል ታማኝ ነህ» አለው፡፡
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱئۡتُونِي بِهِۦٓ أَسۡتَخۡلِصۡهُ لِنَفۡسِيۖ فَلَمَّا كَلَّمَهُۥ قَالَ إِنَّكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَدَيۡنَا مَكِينٌ أَمِينٞ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqāla al-maliku i'tūnī bihi astakhliṣ'hu linafsī falammā kallamahu qāla innaka al-yawma ladaynā makīnun amīnun
